title: Hub Document Frontmatter
description: Metadata schema for hub documents in Trapperkeeper documentation

doc_type.description: Type of documentation. Must be 'hub' for hub documents.

status.description: Current status of the document in its lifecycle

primary_category.description: Primary domain category for this document

tags.description: Additional classification tags for discovery and indexing

consolidated_spokes.description: List of spoke document paths or identifiers consolidated by this hub. Minimum 3 spokes required.

cross_cutting.description: Cross-cutting concerns this hub addresses. Used for index generation.

depends_on.description: Foundational documents that must be understood before this hub. Use document identifiers or relative paths.

extended_by.description: Documents that extend or build upon this hub. Use document identifiers or relative paths.

authors.description: Primary authors or maintainers of this document

maintainer.description: Primary maintainer responsible for hub content accuracy and spoke synchronization

title.description: Optional document title for navigation and display purposes

related_docs.description: Related documents for cross-referencing (use relative paths)
